entry.title: PollTheWorld
entry.summary:
Create polls, vote, and view responses summary. Heroku hosted Backbone.js application consuming RESTful Rails API Custom user authentication system with hashed passwords, session token and guest login Infinite scroll appends next page's Backbone collection on scroll off event Extends Backbone's model parsing to include relations Custom Backbone composite view adds and removes subviews and their listeners Technologies: Rails, Backbone.js, SQL, Jbuilder, Capybara, Heroku, jQuery, AJAX, Chart.js, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, Kaminari

http://www.PollTheWorld.website
